Mount Rwenzori centennial climb

Thomas Gumbricht, June 2006, Mount Rwenzori, Uganda

In June 2006 I participated in the Centenary Celebrations of the Rwenzori climbing by the scientific expedition led by Luigi Amedeo of Savoy, Duke of Abruzzi in 1906. You can find my studies on the glacier retreat in a post on my professional pages.
